LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromGreenTiberium.label: get resources from green Tiberium
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromGreenTiberium.descri: This refinery uses complex reactions to break down green Tiberium into steel.
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromBlueTiberium.label: get resources from blue Tiberium
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromBlueTiberium.descrip: This refinery uses complex reactions to break down blue Tiberium into plasteel.
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromRedTiberium.label: get resources from red Tiberium
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromRedTiberium.descript: This refinery uses complex reactions to break down red Tiberium into gold and Uranium.
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromVeinTiberium.label: get resources from Tiberium veins
LanguageData.ExtractResourcesFromVeinTiberium.descrip: This refinery uses complex reactions to break down Tiberium veins into Uranium and green Tiberium.
LanguageData.MakeBookRiparius.label: Write about green Tiberium.
LanguageData.MakeBookVinifera.label: Write about blue Tiberium.
LanguageData.MakeBookRutila.label: Write about red Tiberium.
